DOC.criteria: For HIVinfected participant , inclusion criteria 1 . 2059 year old , ability provide inform consent 2. receive cART 3 . CD4 cell count ≥200 cell/mm3 within 6 month enrollment 4. plasma HIV1 RNA < 50 copies/mL , 5 ) ability provide inform consent . For group 1. pregnancy lactate 2. receive cancer treatment , organ transplantation , ≥0.5 mg/kg/day prednisolone equivalent , immunomodulating treatment 3. impaired renal function ( creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min ) 4. impaired liver function define ChildPugh C .
